markers.title: KPI Cards
markers.description: High-level metrics displayed in a clean card layout. Each card shows current value, trend indicator, and comparison to previous period. Quick scan design for executive-level decision making.

markers.title: Revenue Trend Chart
markers.description: Interactive line chart showing revenue trends over time. Supports multiple data series and hover tooltips for detailed values. Chart.js powered for smooth animations.

markers.title: Regional Performance
markers.description: Comparison view of different regions or business units. Color-coded bars make it easy to identify top and bottom performers at a glance.

markers.title: Dashboard Header
markers.description: Consolidated header with key performance indicators and quick filters. Provides context and allows users to customize their view without leaving the page.

markers.title: Multi-Metric Visualization
markers.description: Integrated view combining multiple chart types (line, bar, pie) in a cohesive layout. Designed to tell a complete story in a single view.

markers.title: Financial Charts Panel
markers.description: Left-aligned chart layout optimizes for data exploration. Charts stack vertically for easy comparison and scrolling through detailed financial metrics.

markers.title: Summary Statistics
markers.description: Right sidebar contains summary statistics and insights. Clean separation between visualization and numerical data supports different analysis workflows.

markers.title: Expense Breakdown
markers.description: Detailed expense categorization with interactive filtering. Users can drill down into specific categories to understand cost drivers.

markers.title: Sales Funnel Visualization
markers.description: Classic funnel chart showing conversion through sales stages. Width represents volume at each stage, making bottlenecks immediately visible.

markers.title: Conversion Metrics
markers.description: Stage-by-stage conversion rates and drop-off analysis. Helps identify where prospects are lost and where to focus improvement efforts.

markers.title: Overtime Hours Metric
markers.description: NEW: Total overtime hours across all centers this week. Provides quick visibility into labor cost overruns and potential staffing issues.

markers.title: Overtime by Center Chart
markers.description: NEW: Color-coded bar chart showing overtime hours by center. Red indicates high overtime (20+ hrs), yellow indicates moderate (15-20 hrs), helping identify centers that may need additional staffing.

markers.title: On-Call Coverage Distribution
markers.description: NEW: Doughnut chart showing current on-call providers by type. Tracks who's actively on-call vs available, ensuring adequate emergency coverage across both MDAs and CRNAs.

markers.title: Provider Allocation with OT Badges
markers.description: Weekly provider schedule showing who's working where. NEW: Red 'OT' badges highlight providers approaching overtime thresholds (Dr. Thompson at 48.5 hrs).

markers.title: Current On-Call Roster
markers.description: NEW: Real-time view of who's currently on-call by region and provider type. Shows when their on-call shift started for rotation tracking and fairness.

markers.title: Overtime Alerts Panel
markers.description: NEW: Active alerts for providers approaching or exceeding weekly hour thresholds. Red alerts (⚠) for critical, yellow (●) for watch list. Helps prevent burnout and compliance issues.

markers.title: On-Call Badges on Calendar
markers.description: NEW: Yellow 'ON-CALL' badges show which providers are on emergency call rotation while working their regular shifts. Helps schedulers avoid double-booking on-call providers.

markers.title: Overtime Indicators
markers.description: NEW: Red 'OT' tags mark shifts where providers are accumulating overtime hours. Visible directly on calendar entries (Dr. Thompson at Riverview) for at-a-glance overtime tracking.

markers.title: On-Call Rotation Schedule
markers.description: NEW: Sidebar panel showing the week's on-call rotation by provider and region. Color-coded by provider type (MDA blue, CRNA green) with next rotation time clearly indicated.

markers.title: Days in A/R
markers.description: Average days in accounts receivable with trend analysis. Key metric for understanding cash flow and collection efficiency.

markers.title: Collection Rate
markers.description: Percentage of billed amounts successfully collected. Tracks effectiveness of revenue cycle processes and identifies improvement opportunities.

markers.title: Provider Cards
markers.description: Individual provider profiles in card format. Each card shows key metrics like patient volume, satisfaction scores, and credential status for quick assessment.

markers.title: Performance Metrics
markers.description: Visual indicators of provider performance across multiple dimensions. Supports data-driven decisions about staffing, training, and recognition.

markers.title: NPS Score
markers.description: Net Promoter Score with historical trend. Primary measure of client satisfaction and loyalty, tracked over time to measure improvement.

markers.title: Satisfaction Drivers
markers.description: Breakdown of factors influencing client satisfaction. Helps prioritize improvement initiatives by identifying what matters most to clients.

markers.title: Client Feedback
markers.description: Recent client comments and survey responses. Qualitative data provides context and specific insights beyond numerical scores.

markers.title: Scenario Type Tabs
markers.description: NEW: Switch between four scenario types: Hiring Analysis (adding new providers), Rebalancing (moving providers between centers), Case Redistribution (shifting workload), and On-Call Policy changes. Each scenario has unique controls and impact modeling.

markers.title: Interactive Controls Panel
markers.description: NEW: Fully interactive scenario builder with center selection, provider type choice, and parameter sliders. Changes update in real-time across all visualizations. Each scenario has context-specific controls optimized for that analysis type.

markers.title: Impact Summary Cards
markers.description: NEW: Before/after comparison cards showing key metrics: Overtime Hours/Week, Annual Net Impact ($), Coverage Rate, and Provider Workload balance. Delta indicators use color coding (green=improvement, red=concern, gray=neutral) with percentage changes.

markers.title: Overtime Comparison Chart
markers.description: NEW: Bar chart showing current vs projected overtime hours by center. Red bars show current state, green bars show projected state after implementing the scenario. Makes impact visually obvious for quick decision-making.

markers.title: Financial Impact Over Time
markers.description: NEW: Line chart showing cumulative financial impact over 24 months. Accounts for both costs (hiring, relocation) and savings (reduced OT). Break-even point clearly visible where line crosses zero.

markers.title: Auto-Generated Recommendations
markers.description: NEW: AI-style recommendation engine analyzes scenario parameters and generates specific guidance. Considers ROI, break-even timeline, feasibility, and risk factors. Updates dynamically as you adjust controls.

markers.title: Financial Summary
markers.description: NEW: Detailed breakdown of net annual impact and break-even period. Shows exact dollar amounts for decision approval. Color-coded to highlight positive (green) vs negative (red) financial outcomes.

markers.title: Scenario Save & Reset
markers.description: NEW: Save promising scenarios for later comparison or reset controls to start fresh. Allows exploring multiple variations without losing work. (Note: Save feature is demonstration-only in this mockup.)
